MemoryInfobox.description: 'As one of the Champions of Boeotia, Deianeira was in Kassandra's way and had to be dealt with, but she was not to be taken lightly.'
MemoryInfobox.previous:
The End of Drakon
Sibling Revenge {{C|Support Quest}}

General_Description: '''The Fall of Deianeira''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Under the orders of [[Stentor]], as well as part of her quest to demolish the [[Cult of Kosmos]], Kassandra found [[Deianeira]], one of the [[Champions of Boeotia]] in the [[Reborn Hills]] of [[Boeotia]].
Section_Dialogue: After learning of Deianeira's location from [[Timon]], Kassandra made her way to the [[Cave of the Oracle]]. After navigating her way through the caverns, she found Deianeira in one of the chambers, eliminating her.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated Deianeira, one of the Champions of Boeotia and a member of the [[Cult of Kosmos]].
Section_Trivia: *If the quest [[Sibling Revenge]] is finished, Deianeira can be found within her dwelling in the depths of the [[Cave of the Oracle]] in Reborn Hills, mourning the death of [[Astra]], her cousin. Otherwise, Deianeira can be found wandering the hills.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
